contexts.context: ...you for your justice, Lord Vivec. I shall be <mark>neither</mark> cruel nor arbitrary, for fair dealing earns the love,...
...you for your courtesy, Lord Vivec. I shall speak <mark>neither</mark> hurtful nor harsh word, but shall speak respectfully, even...
...Thank you for your generosity, Lord Vivec. I shall <mark>neither</mark> hoard nor steal, nor encumber myself with profitless treasures,...
...Thank you for your humility, Lord Vivec. I shall <mark>neither</mark> strut nor preen in vanity, but shall know and give...
